criticalGaps.title: Missing table: people
criticalGaps.description: Table 'people' (People directory) not found in migrations
criticalGaps.impact: Blocks all workflows requiring this data
criticalGaps.remediation: Create migration for people table with proper columns, constraints, and RLS policies
